mapper.select: SELECT wr.walking_record_id AS walkingRecordId , wr.walking_record_date AS walkingRecordDate , wr.walking_record_duration AS walkingRecordDuration , u.user_nickname AS userName FROM walking_record wr JOIN user u ON wr.user_id = u.user_id WHERE wr.walking_record_date = #{date} AND wr.user_id = #{userId} AND wr.walking_record_state = 'ACTIVE'
